√tam 'faint'

present: [4.] tā́myati etc. B.+  tā́myate etc. E.+  

perfect: tatāma  

aorist: [1.] atami  atāmi   -- [2.] tamat etc.  

[future: tamiṣyati  tamitā  ]

verbal: tāṃtá B.+  támitos  

secondary: causative: tamáyati etc.  

derivatives: tamaka  tamana S.  támas V.+  tamī C.  támiṣīci V.  támisra V.+  tāṃti C.  -tameru VS.  tamrá RV.  tāma C.  -tāmaka C.  tāmī S.  tāmrá AV.+
